patterns_discovered.documentation_structure: Documentation follows consistent table format with columns for Option, Type, Default, and Description
patterns_discovered.configuration_standard: Cache configuration uses nested YAML structure under `llm.cache` namespace
patterns_discovered.command_documentation: CLI commands documented with bash syntax highlighting and clear usage examples

gotchas_discovered.file_naming: Configuration file path mentioned as `.ai/config.yaml` but note shows `llm_cache.json` path - potential inconsistency
gotchas_discovered.dependencies: Subtask 7-2 has dependencies on 5-1 and 5-3 but was completed with 7-1, suggesting loose dependency enforcement
gotchas_discovered.scope_merge: Subtask 7-2 documentation was actually completed as part of 7-1, indicating natural documentation scope overlap

approach_outcome.approach: Documentation-first approach with comprehensive table format and practical examples
approach_outcome.effectiveness: Highly effective - added complete cache configuration documentation with clear examples and management commands
approach_outcome.efficiency: Efficient - completed two subtasks simultaneously due to logical documentation grouping
approach_outcome.quality: High-quality documentation with proper formatting, examples, and clear explanations of benefits

recommendations.documentation: Maintain the comprehensive table format for future configuration options
recommendations.consistency: Verify and standardize configuration file paths across documentation
recommendations.scope_management: Consider formalizing documentation scope to prevent accidental overlap between subtasks
